briefTitle: Transabdominal Plane (TAP) Blocks for Inguinal Hernia Repairs

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

\- Patients undergoing laparoscopic inguinal hernia repair at the Mount Sinai Hospital

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients who are younger than 18 years old,
* have a history of chronic opiate usage, liver or kidney disease, pain syndromes,
* allergy to bupivacaine,
* are pregnant or
* are unable to independently give consent

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score at Rest
outcomeMeasures.description: On the pain score instrument, patients will score their pain score at rest. The full scale is scored between 1-10, with higher score indicating more pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score at Rest
outcomeMeasures.description: On the pain score instrument, patients will score their pain score at rest. The full scale is scored between 1-10, with higher score indicating more pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score at Movement
outcomeMeasures.description: On the pain score instrument, patients will score their pain score at movement. The full scale is scored between 1-10, with higher score indicating more pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score at Movement
outcomeMeasures.description: On the pain score instrument, patients will score their pain score at movement. The full scale is scored between 1-10, with higher score indicating more pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Opioid Pills
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients recorded the number of opioid pills taken.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Opioid Pills
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients recorded the number of opioid pills taken.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Non-opioid Pain Medication
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients recorded the number of non-opioid pills taken for pain control.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Non-opioid Pain Medication
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients recorded the number of non-opioid pills taken for pain control.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Intraoperative Complications
outcomeMeasures.description: Chart review complications recorded. These are considered expected intraoperative complications and are not considered as adverse events based on research procedures.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Contents in the Hernia
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with contents in the hernia, specifically bowel, lipoma, omentum, and bladder.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Surgical Tacks Used Per Repair
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of tacks used in bilateral hernia surgery per repair. The more tacks used can be associated with increased pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Greater or Less Than 25 Milliliters Estimated Blood Loss
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with greater or less than 25 milliliters estimated blood loss recorded during procedure.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients Per Anesthesiologist
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of patients handled per anesthesiologist.
